title: WottleNFT: SDGs Driven NFT Auction
description: How can Cardano align their values with the UN Sustainable Development Goals?

f6_assessments.q0: Creating and auctioning NFTs to donate to Social Development Goals projects addresses the challenge brief of creating business models with NFT's at the core. Minting and selling social NFTs will increase the use and number of NFTs on Cardano, thus increasing utility and providing value to the ecosystem. I would like the team to refine the problem statement and solution, at the moment the two read disconnected from each other Problem= SDG projects struggle for funding, Solution = Auctioning NFTs for Donations to SDG projects.) I would like the team to think how they will scale and market the platform.
f6_assessments.q1: The team provided a link to a Github repository. I feel the proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would like the team to expand on the responsibilities and deliverables of each member of the team, this way we can better judge whether there is a work overload in one area. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed". I would like the team to further expand on the plan to go to market and acquire customers for the platform.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a high level roadmap and budget. I would like to see the team develop Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) (create 100 NFTs by month x, sell 50 NFTs by month y, etc) for the project, and connect the KPIs to the milestones on the project roadmap (timeline). I would like to see the team create a solid roadmap -  develop and add milestones to provide deeper detail, set technical development milestones for creating the product. I would like to see the budget developed beyond single line entries and broken down into monthly spending, and I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the spending, what are the specific tasks and deliverables that the labor must provide and when must they deliver the tasks – this breakdown will give a clearer indication about the implementation workload feasibility and match the deliverables to the spending - thus the team can track performance and spending over a timeline. As the project stands at the moment, I feel the project will be challenging to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal makes a case that an NFT auction site donating to social enterprises would promote global mass adoption of Cardano. This seems realistic assuming the platform is widely adopted, but i see this as a significant challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The description of the team is not very detailed but does indicate considerable development background. The roadmap is clearly defined but moves slowly and I wonder if they will be able to compete with other auction platforms
f6_assessments.q2: Goals and features are fairly straightforward and defined. The budget is broken down in detail and seems realistic. It should be easy to judge the overall success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This is exactly the type of environmentally friendly proposal/project needed on the Cardano Ecosystem. I like the flexibility which allows the winner of the auction to pick which sustainable development goal to make a donation. All around detailed and effective proposal for the given challenge with an added bonus of Social Enterprise. This NFT marketplace will be very popular with the Cardano community that values sustainability highly.
f6_assessments.q1: Very impressive team with 9 NUS Students and 8 Full-Stack / Plutus Pioneer Developers. This team and detailed proposal gives me great confidence in the ability to implement this NFT platform successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap and budget breakdown give clarity to the vision and definition of success. The four phases seem like reasonable timelines breaking down quarterly goals and projected spending. "WottleNFT strives to be the first Sustainable NFT Auction Site" and I believe the Catalyst Community will have your full support. I have their website (https://www.wottlenft.com/),which is already in development, bookmarked so I can scoop up some early NFTs. I am pumped for this team! It is my job to find some constructive criticism so my one nitpick is I would like some clarity on what enhancements are expected from "Upgrade of WottleNFT Auction Site v2.0"? Please list a few ideas on what you invision v2.0 to entail.

solution: WottleNFT aims to align the values of each NFT Collector to the SDGs by allowing the highest bidder to choose the SDG that they support.
